content.question: public class ItemInventory{private int numItems;public ItemInventory(int num){numItems = num;}public updateItems(int newNum){numItems = newNum;}}Which of the following best identifies the reason the class does not compile?

choices.label: The constructor header is missing a return type.
The updateItems method is missing a return type.
The updateItems method should not have a parameter.
The instance variable numItems should be public instead of private.

content.answer: The updateItems method is missing a return type.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
